metadata.titleEn: Future projection data set of surface meteorological elements in East Asia (2006-2098)
metadata.titleCn: 东亚区域地面气象要素未来预估数据集（2006-2098）
metadata.description: The RCM employed is the International Center for Theoretical Physics (ICTP) Regional Climate Model version 4 (RegCM4, Giorgi et al., 2012). The domain used is the Coordinated Regional Climate Downscaling Experiment (CORDEX) Phase II East Asia domain, covering whole of China and its surrounding East Asia areas. The model is run at 25 km gird spacing, with its standard configuration of 18 vertical sigma layers with a model top at 10 hPa. Configuration of the model follows Gao et al. (2016, 2017), with land cover data over China was updated as reported by Han et al. (2015) to better represent the realistic vegetation. The initial and lateral boundary conditions needed to drive RegCM4 are derived from the CMIP5 models of HadGEM2-ES (RCP4.5 pathways), and the data set include temperature and precipitation.
metadata.descriptionCn: 试验所采用的区域气候模式（RCM）是国际理论物理中心的RegCM4 (Giorgi et al., 2012)，模拟区域为联合区域气候降尺度协同试验第二阶段东亚（CORDEX Phase II East Asia）的推荐区域，覆盖整个中国及其周边的东亚地区。模式的水平分辨率为25 km，模式垂直方向是18层，层顶高度为10 hPa，模式的参数设置按照Gao et al. (2016, 2017)，并根据韩振宇等 (2015) 更新了中国土地覆盖数据，以可以地描述下垫面植被状况。RegCM4所需的初始和侧边界条件由CMIP5全球气候模式HadGEM2-ES的模拟结果提供（RCP4.5情景），数据主要包含气温和降水要素。
metadata.instructions: File name: the temperature and precipitation data are stored in NC format, and the file name is ea_sts.2006-2098.mon.xy.nc, which represents the future projection of temperature and precipitation in the simulation area from January 2006 to December 2098.
metadata.instructionsCn: 文件命名：气温和降水数据以nc格式存储，文件的名称为ea_sts.2006-2098.mon.xy.nc, 代表从2006年1月开始到2098年12月结束的模拟区域气温和降水的未来预估情况。

authorList.unitCn: 中国科学院大气物理研究所

literatureList.titleEn: Future changes in thermal comfort conditions over China based on multi-RegCM4 simulations
literatureList.referenceEn: Gao, X.J., Wu, J., Shi, Y., Wu, J., Han, Z.y., Zhang, D.F., Tong, Y., Li, R.K., Xu, Y. & Filippo, GIORGI. (2018). Future changes in thermal comfort conditions over China based on multi-RegCM4 simulations, Atmospheric and Oceanic Science Letters, 11(04), 291-299. DOI: 10.1080/16742834.2018.1471578

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of the regional climate model used for meteorological element projections in East Asia for the period 2006-2098?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于2006-2098年东亚气象要素预测的区域气候模型的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: RegCM4, horizontal resolution of 25 km, 18 vertical layers, top layer at 10 hPa, updated land cover data for China, initial and boundary conditions from CMIP5 HadGEM2-ES, RCP4.5 scenario, temperature and precipitation elements.
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: RegCM4，水平分辨率为25公里，垂直方向有18层，顶层位于10 hPa，使用更新的中国土地覆盖数据，初始和边界条件来自CMIP5的HadGEM2-ES，RCP4.5情景，温度和降水要素。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the horizontal resolution of the regional climate model used for predicting future meteorological elements in East Asia?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 用于预测东亚未来气象要素的区域气候模型的水平分辨率是多少？

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do data collection techniques using the RegCM4 regional climate model compare to those using other regional climate models in terms of accuracy and resolution for predicting future meteorological elements in East Asia?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用RegCM4区域气候模型的数据收集技术与其他区域气候模型在预测东亚未来气象要素的准确性和分辨率方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The data collection technique using the RegCM4 regional climate model involves a horizontal resolution of 25 km and vertical layers extending up to 10 hPa, specifically for the East Asia region recommended by CORDEX Phase II. It incorporates updated land cover data for China to describe vegetation conditions, as per Gao et al. (2016, 2017) and Han Zhenyu et al. (2015). The initial and boundary conditions are provided by the CMIP5 global climate model HadGEM2-ES under the RCP4.5 scenario, focusing on temperature and precipitation elements. Comparatively, other regional climate models may differ in spatial resolution, vertical stratification, and input data sources, affecting the precision and applicability of future meteorological predictions in East Asia.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 使用RegCM4区域气候模型的数据收集技术涉及25公里的水平分辨率和延伸至10 hPa的垂直层，特别针对CORDEX第二阶段推荐的东亚地区。它结合了更新的中国土地覆盖数据，以描述植被状况，参考了Gao等人（2016, 2017）和韩振宇等人（2015）的研究。初始和边界条件由CMIP5全球气候模型HadGEM2-ES在RCP4.5情景下提供，重点关注温度和降水要素。相比之下，其他区域气候模型在空间分辨率、垂直分层和输入数据来源上可能存在差异，这会影响未来东亚地区气象预测的精确性和适用性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the horizontal resolution of 25 km and vertical layering up to 10 hPa in a dataset influence the accuracy and detail of climate predictions for East Asia?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在数据集中，水平分辨率为25公里，垂直分层达到10 hPa，这些因素会如何影响东亚地区气候预测的准确性和细节？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The horizontal resolution of 25 km allows for relatively detailed spatial representation of climate phenomena, capturing regional variability within East Asia. The vertical layering up to 10 hPa provides a comprehensive view of atmospheric processes, contributing to more accurate climate predictions by capturing interactions between different atmospheric layers. This can enhance the ability to model complex climate dynamics and predict future trends in temperature and precipitation.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 25公里的水平分辨率允许对气候现象进行相对详细的空间表示，捕捉东亚地区的变异性。垂直层次达到10 hPa提供了对大气过程的全面视角，通过捕捉不同大气层之间的相互作用，有助于更准确的气候预测。这可以增强对复杂气候动态的建模能力，并预测未来温度和降水的趋势。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are involved in setting up a regional climate model to simulate future climate conditions over East Asia, specifically considering the use of RegCM4 with updates to land cover data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 设置区域气候模型以模拟东亚未来气候条件的程序步骤有哪些，特别是考虑使用RegCM4并更新土地覆盖数据？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The regional climate model (RCM) setup involves using the RegCM4 model with a horizontal resolution of 25 km and vertical stratification into 18 layers up to 10 hPa. The simulation area is defined as the recommended region for the CORDEX Phase II East Asia, covering China and surrounding regions. The model's parameter settings are based on previous work by Gao et al. (2016, 2017) and include updated land cover data for China to accurately describe vegetation conditions. Initial and lateral boundary conditions are derived from the CMIP5 global climate model HadGEM2-ES simulations under the RCP4.5 scenario. The primary meteorological parameters included in the data are temperature and precipitation.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 区域气候模型（RCM）设置涉及使用RegCM4模型，水平分辨率为25公里，垂直分层为18层，直至10 hPa。模拟区域定义为CORDEX第二阶段东亚的推荐区域，涵盖中国及周边地区。模型的参数设置基于Gao等人（2016，2017）的先前工作，并更新了中国的土地覆盖数据，以准确描述植被状况。初始和侧边界条件来源于CMIP5全球气候模型HadGEM2-ES在RCP4.5情景下的模拟。数据中包含的主要气象参数包括温度和降水量。
